text:
Michael Negrete (born March 25, 1981 - disappeared December 10, 1999) was an American missing person. He was 18 years old when he went missing. Police think he was murdered.
On December 10, 1999, he was playing a multiplayer video game on his computer with his close friends in their dorms. He finished the game at around 4 in the morning and turned off his computer. After that, he came out of his room and told his friends it was a good game. He was never seen since. However, his key to the dorm room and his other stuff were found that morning.
